title: New: Mom Tudie x Tom Misch – Waiting On You
content:
Talk about two birds, one stone.

We’ve featured Mom Tudie on Crack in the Road before, however it’s been a long time coming for 18 year old Londoner Tom Misch to make his way onto the pages of our fair blog.

Two insanely talented musicians/producers, Mom Tudie and Tom Misch joining forces has led to the creation of ‘Waiting On You’, a track that is coated in a Balearic feel and is a guaranteed repeat listen. An enticing vocal line is underpinned by a gorgeous bass line, both of which fluctuate in speed and intensity in a manner similar to the gentle lapping of waves against an Iberian shore.

There is no doubt these are two artists to keep your eye on in 2014.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
